DOC.brief_summary: This observational , non-interventional cohort study evaluate predictor response patient chronic hepatitis B receive standard care Pegasys therapy . Efficacy safety parameter also evaluate . Patients include study follow duration treatment 3 year thereafter .
DOC.brief_title: An Observational Cohort Study Patients With Chronic Hepatitis B Receiving Pegasys
DOC.criteria: adult patient , > /= 18 year age chronic hepatitis B treatment peginterferon alfa2A coinfection HAV , HCV HIV
